subject: Football
Recordings and Downloads (Video)
lead_paragraph: Matt Walsh’s view of Spygate differs from that of the Patriots, the N.F.L. and anyone else who contends that the videotaping of opponents’ signals had little effect on the Patriots’ performance.
snippet: Matt Walsh’s view of Spygate differs from that of the Patriots, the N.F.L. and anyone else who contends that the videotaping of opponents’ signals had little effect on the Patriots’ performance.
